entry.title: Combined summary - Hello
entry.summary: A new member of the Lightning-dev mailing list expressed concern for not receiving any emails or updates since joining the list a week ago. Cezary Dziemian posted this message on October 8th, and another member, Ricardo Filipe, informed them that there had been no discussion on the list since September 19th. The Linux Foundation manages the Lightning-dev mailing list, which is used to discuss topics related to the Lightning Network. Ricardo Filipe directed Cezary to the mailing list archive where they could check for existing discussions. The post made by Cezary also included an unrelated advertisement for virus protection. It remains unclear whether Cezary's subscription was malfunctioning or there had been no discussions for a week. The Lightning-dev mailing list offers users access to previous discussions through its archive.
